Articles.Content:
I'm trying to build a satellite that has Kethane scan capabilities, as well as Remote Tech and ISA Mapsat capabilities. Question is what is compatible with what? There are several makes of solar panels, batteries, satellite dishes, ion engines... Trying to figure out what works together has been giving me a headache for 3 days now. Any advice?

Also - is there any way that the Kethane scan data can be aggregated into a global view of the mun/minmus?
